body.title: Display the amount of available disk space
body.elms:
```sh
df
df -h   # human-readable format
df -a   # all filesystems
```

body.title: Display disk usage
body.elms:
```sh
du
du -hsx * | sort -rh | head -10    # largest 10 folders
```
